original_text:
Some Hebrews even crossed the Jordan to the land of Gad and Gilead.
Saul remained at Gilgal, and all the troops with him were quaking with fear.
korean_text: 어떤 히브리 사람들은 요단을 건너 갓과 길르앗 땅으로 가되 사울은 아직 길갈에 있고 그를 따른 모든 백성은 떨더라

sentences.original_text: Some Hebrews even crossed the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 히브리 사람들은 심지어 요단을 건넜고

sentences.original_text: to the land of Gad and Gilead
and all the troops with him
